about_the_game:
Platform:
Steam
Game play
is a first person adventure puzzle game. The protagonist controled by players is a patient with dark phobia. If he is in a narrow environment or the light source disappears, the protagonist will be swallowed up by boundless fear. In the game, players must expand the exploration area by lighting the light source, avoid the darkness, solve layers of mysteries, complete the task, and finally escape the danger.
Style
Tiny terror，dark environment
Story:
This is a story about the constant challenges of special people (special occupation + symptoms) and finally overcome their fears and break through themselves. Part of the story is adapted from real events.

  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 / AMD FX™-8320 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050Ti / AMD Radeon RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700/ AMD Ryzen 2500X or better
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070/ AMD RX 5700
